If so , it 's uncommonly considerate and thoughtful of [him]248-the doctor , by [Gad]77-gad . [I]57-paul wo n't say any more . "[57-paul] But by - and - by , the open window made [him]248-the doctor break [his]248-the doctor resolution . " [I]248-the doctor 'm sorry to inconvenience [you]248-the doctor , [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone , "[248-the doctor] [he]248-the doctor said , with the air of one used to having [his]248-the doctor way in these matters , " but [I]248-the doctor positively must ask [you]248-the doctor either to allow [me]248-the doctor to have this window up or to change places with [you]248-the doctor . The night air , [sir]2329-sir , at this time of the year is fatal , [[my]248-the doctor doctor]2573-my doctor tells [me]248-the doctor , simply fatal to [a man of [my]248-the doctor constitution]2574-a man of my constitution . "[248-the doctor] [The Doctor]248-the doctor pulled up the window with a frown , and yet a somewhat puzzled expression . " [I]248-the doctor warn [you]248-the doctor , [Bultitude]57-paul , "[248-the doctor] [he]248-the doctor said , " [you]248-the doctor are acting very imprudently . "[248-the doctor] " So [I]57-paul am , "[57-paul] thought [Paul]57-paul , " so [I]57-paul am . Good of [him]2573-my doctor to remind [me]57-paul . [I]57-paul must keep it up before [all these boys]2575-all these boys . This unpleasant business must n't get about . [I]57-paul 'll hold [my]57-paul tongue till [we]2576-we get in . Then , [I]57-paul daresay , [Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone will see [me]57-paul off by [the next train]2577-the next train up , if there is one , and lend [me]57-paul enough for a bed at [an hotel]2578-an hotel for the night . [I]57-paul could n't get to [St. Pancras]25-st. pancras till very late , of course . Or [he]2573-my doctor might offer to put [me]57-paul up at [the school]506-the school . If [he]2573-my doctor does , [I]57-paul think [I]57-paul shall very possibly accept . It might be better . "[57-paul] And [he]589-his leant back in [his]589-his seat in a much easier frame of mind ; it was annoying , of course , to have been turned out of [[his]589-his warm dining - room]590-his warm dining - room , and sent all the way down to [Market Rodwell]5-market rodwell on [a fool]591-a fool 's errand like this ; but still , if nothing worse came of it , [he]589-his could put up with the temporary inconvenience , and it was a great relief to be spared the necessity of an explanation . [The other boys]592-the other boys watched [him]589-his furtively with growing admiration , which expressed itself in subdued whispers , varied by little gurgles and " squirks "[592-the other boys] of laughter ; [they]592-the other boys tried to catch [his]589-his eye and stimulate [him]589-his to further feats of audacity , but [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul , of course , repulsed all such overtures with a coldness and severity which at once baffled and piqued [them]592-the other boys . At last [his]589-his eccentricity took a shape which considerably lessened [their]592-the other boys enthusiasm . [Kiffin]91-kiffin , [the new boy]593-the new boy , occupied the seat next to [Paul]57-paul ; [he]91-kiffin was [a nervous - looking little fellow , with a pale face and big pathetic brown eyes like a seal]594-a nervous - looking little fellow , with a pale face and big pathetic brown eyes like a seal 's , and [his]91-kiffin dress bore plain evidence of [a mother]237-a mother 's careful supervision , having all the uncreased trimness and specklessness rarely to be observed except in the toilettes of the waxen prodigies in a shop - window . It happened that , as [he]589-his lay back in the padded seat between the sheltering partitions , watching the sickly yellow dregs of oil surging dismally to and fro with the motion in the lamp overhead , or the black indistinct forms flitting past through the misty blue outside , the pathos of [his]589-his situation became all at once too much for [him]589-his . [He]589-his was [a home - bred boy]596-a home - bred boy , without any of that taste for the companionship and pursuits of [[his]589-his fellows]597-his fellows , or capacity for adapting [himself]589-his to [their]592-the other boys prejudices and requirements , which give [some home - bred boys]598-some home - bred boys a ready passport into [the roughest communities]599-the roughest communities . [His]589-his heart throbbed with no excited curiosity , no conscious pride , at this [his]589-his first important step in life ; [he]589-his was [a forlorn little stranger , in [an unsympathetic strange land]601-an unsympathetic strange land , and was only too well aware of [his]589-his position]600-a forlorn little stranger , in an unsympathetic strange land , and was only too well aware of his position . So that it is not surprising that as [he]589-his thought of [the home [he]589-his had left an hour or two ago which now seemed so shadowy , so inaccessible and remote]602-the home he had left an hour or two ago which now seemed so shadowy , so inaccessible and remote , [his]589-his eyes began to smart and sting , and [his]589-his chest to heave ominously , until [he]589-his felt it necessary to do something to give a partial vent to [his]589-his emotions and prevent a public and disgraceful exhibition of grief . Unhappily for [him]589-his [he]589-his found this safety - valve in a series of suppressed but distinctly audible sniffs .

[Mr. Bultitude]57-paul bore this for some time with no other protest than an occasional indignant bounce or a lowering frown in [the offender]603-the offender 's direction , but at last [his]57-paul nerves , strung already to a high pitch by all [he]57-paul had undergone , could stand it no longer . " [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone , "[589-his] [he]589-his said with polite determination , " [I]589-his 'm not [a man to complain without good reason]2580-a man to complain without good reason , but really [I]589-his must ask [you]62-dr. grimstone to interfere . Will [you]62-dr. grimstone tell [this boy]2581-this boy here , on [my]589-his right , either to control [his]2581-this boy feelings or to cry into [his]2581-this boy pocket - handkerchief , like [an ordinary human being]2582-an ordinary human being ? A good honest bellow [I]589-his can understand , but this infernal whiffling and sniffing , [sir]2329-sir , [I]589-his will not put up with . It 's nothing less than unnatural in [a boy of that size]2584-a boy of that size . "[589-his] " [Kiffin]91-kiffin , "[248-the doctor] said [the Doctor]248-the doctor , " are [you]91-kiffin crying ? "[248-the doctor] " N — no , [sir]2329-sir , "[91-kiffin] faltered [Kiffin]91-kiffin ; " [I]91-kiffin — [I]91-kiffin think [I]91-kiffin must have caught cold , [sir]2329-sir . "[91-kiffin] " [I]248-the doctor hope [you]62-dr. grimstone are telling [me]248-the doctor the truth , because [I]248-the doctor should be sorry to believe [you]62-dr. grimstone were beginning [your]62-dr. grimstone new life in a spirit of captiousness and rebellion . [I]248-the doctor 'll have [no mutineers in [[my]248-the doctor camp]2588-my camp]2587-no mutineers in my camp . [I]248-the doctor 'll establish a spirit of trustful happiness and unmurmuring content in [this school]2589-this school , if [I]248-the doctor have to flog [every boy in it]2590-every boy in it as long as [I]248-the doctor can stand over [him]2590-every boy in it ! As for [you]62-dr. grimstone , [Richard Bultitude]87-mr. bultitude , [I]248-the doctor have no words to express [my]248-the doctor pain and disgust at the heartless irreverence with which [you]62-dr. grimstone persist in mimicking and burlesquing [a fond and excellent parent]2591-a fond and excellent parent . Unless [I]248-the doctor perceive , [sir]2329-sir , in a very short time a due sense of [your]62-dr. grimstone error and a lively repentance , [my]248-the doctor disapproval will take a very practical form . "[248-the doctor] [Mr. Bultitude]87-mr. bultitude fell back into [his]87-mr. bultitude seat with a gasp . It was hard to be accused of caricaturing [[one]271-one 's own self]606-one 's own self , particularly when conscious of entire innocence in that respect , but even this was slight in comparison with the discovery that [he]87-mr. bultitude had been so blindly deceiving [himself]87-mr. bultitude ! [The Doctor]248-the doctor evidently had failed to penetrate [his]87-mr. bultitude disguise , and the dreaded scene of elaborate explanation must be gone through after all .

[The boys]570-the boys ( with the exception of [Kiffin]91-kiffin ) still found exquisite enjoyment in this extraordinary and original exhibition , and waited eagerly for further experiment on [the Doctor]248-the doctor 's patience . [They]570-the boys were soon gratified . If there was one thing [Paul]57-paul detested more than another , it was the smell of peppermint — no less than [three office boys]610-three office boys had been discharged by [him]57-paul because , as [he]57-paul alleged , [they]610-three office boys made [[the clerks]611-the clerks ' room]612-the clerks ' room reek with it,—and now the subtle searching odour of the hated confection was gradually stealing into [the compartment]613-the compartment and influencing its atmosphere . [He]57-paul looked at [Coggs]89-coggs , who sat on the seat opposite to [him]57-paul , and saw [his]89-coggs cheeks and lips moving in slow and appreciative absorption of something . [Coggs]89-coggs was clearly [the culprit]614-the culprit . " Do [you]248-the doctor encourage [[your]248-the doctor boys]2593-your boys to make common nuisances of [themselves]2593-your boys in [a public place]523-a public place , may [I]57-paul ask , [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone ? "[57-paul] [he]57-paul inquired , fuming . " Some scarcely seem to require encouragement , [Bultitude]57-paul , "[248-the doctor] said [the Doctor]248-the doctor pointedly : " what is the matter now ? "[248-the doctor] " If [he]89-coggs takes it medicinally , "[57-paul] said [Paul]57-paul , " [he]89-coggs should choose some other time and place to treat [his]89-coggs complaint . If [he]89-coggs has a depraved liking for the abominable stuff , for Heaven 's sake make [him]89-coggs refrain from it on occasions when it is a serious annoyance to [others]2595-others ! "[57-paul] " Will [you]248-the doctor explain ? Who and what are [you]248-the doctor talking about ? "[248-the doctor] " [That boy opposite]2596-that boy opposite , "[57-paul] said [Paul]57-paul , pointing the finger of denunciation at [the astonished Coggs]89-coggs ; " [he]2596-that boy opposite 's sucking an infernal peppermint lozenge strong enough to throw [the train]2319-the train off the rails ! "[57-paul] " Is what [Bultitude]57-paul tells [me]248-the doctor true , [Coggs]89-coggs ? "[248-the doctor] demanded [the Doctor]248-the doctor in an awful voice . [Coggs]89-coggs , after making several attempts to bolt [the offending lozenge , and turning scarlet meanwhile]617-the offending lozenge , and turning scarlet meanwhile with confusion and coughing , stammered huskily something to the effect that [he]89-coggs had " bought the lozenges at [a chemist]2598-a chemist 's , "[89-coggs] which [he]89-coggs seemed to consider , for some reason , a mitigating circumstance . " Have [you]57-paul any more of this pernicious stuff about [you]57-paul ? "[248-the doctor] said [the Doctor]248-the doctor . Very slowly and reluctantly [Coggs]89-coggs brought out of one pocket after another three or four neat little white packets , made up with that lavish expenditure of time , string , and sealing - wax , by which [the struggling chemist]619-the struggling chemist seeks to reconcile the public mind to a charge of two hundred and fifty per cent . on cost price , and handed them to [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone , who solemnly unfastened them one by one , glanced at their contents with infinite disgust , and flung them out of window . Then [he]62-dr. grimstone turned to [Paul]57-paul with a look of more favour than [he]62-dr. grimstone had yet shown [him]57-paul . " [Bultitude]57-paul , "[62-dr. grimstone] [he]62-dr. grimstone said , " [I]62-dr. grimstone am obliged to [you]57-paul . A severe cold in the head has rendered [me]62-dr. grimstone incapable of detecting this insidious act of insubordination and self - indulgence , on which [I]62-dr. grimstone shall have more to say on another occasion . [Your]57-paul moral courage and promptness in denouncing the evil thing are much to [your]57-paul credit . "[62-dr. grimstone] " Not at all , "[57-paul] said [Paul]57-paul , " not at all , [[my]57-paul dear sir]2599-my dear sir . [I]57-paul mentioned it because [I]57-paul — ah — happen to be peculiarly sensitive on the subject and — — "[57-paul] Here [he]57-paul broke off with a sharp yell , and began to rub [his]57-paul ankle . " [One of [these young savages]2601-these young savages]2600-one of these young savages has just given [me]57-paul a severe kick ; it 's [that fellow over there]2602-that fellow over there , with the blue necktie . "[57-paul] " So , [Coker]88-coker "[88-coker] ( [Coker]88-coker wore a blue necktie ) , said [the Doctor]248-the doctor , " [you]88-coker emulate [the wild ass]2604-the wild ass in more qualities than those of stupidity and stubbornness , do [you]88-coker ? Six pairs of sulky glowering eyes were fixed upon the unconscious [Paul]57-paul for the rest of the journey ; indignant protests and dark vows of vengeance were muttered under cover of the friendly roar and rattle of [tunnels]621-tunnels . But the object of [them]622-them heard nothing ; [his]57-paul composure was returning once more in the sunshine of [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone 's approbation , and [he]57-paul almost decided on declaring [himself]57-paul in [the station fly]623-the station fly . And now at last [the train]2319-the train was grinding along discordantly with the brakes on , and , after a little preliminary jolting and banging over the points , drew up at [a long lighted platform]625-a long lighted platform , where [melancholy porters]626-melancholy porters paced up and down , croaking " [Market Rodwell]5-market rodwell ! "[626-melancholy porters] like so many [Solomon Eagles]68-solomon predicting woe . [Paul]57-paul got out with [the others]627-the others , and walked forward to [[the guard]552-the guard 's van]629-the guard 's van , where [he]57-paul stood shivering in the raw night air by a small heap of portmanteaux and white clamped boxes . " [I]57-paul should like to tell [him]62-dr. grimstone all about it now , "[57-paul] [he]57-paul thought , " if [he]62-dr. grimstone was n't so busy . "[57-paul] [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone certainly did not seem in a very receptive mood for confidences just then . No flys were to be seen , which [he]62-dr. grimstone took as a personal outrage , and visited upon [the station - master]630-the station - master in hot indignation . " It 's scandalous , [I]62-dr. grimstone tell [you]2611-you , "[62-dr. grimstone] [he]62-dr. grimstone was saying : " scandalous ! No cabs to meet [the train]2319-the train . " [They]631-we will be [valuable witnesses]2620-valuable witnesses , "[57-paul] [he]57-paul said to [himself]57-paul , " that , whoever else [I]57-paul may be , [I]57-paul am not [Dick]60-dick . " [I]57-paul only wish [I]57-paul could , "[57-paul] said poor Mr. Bultitude—"but [I]57-paul ca n't ! "[89-coggs] And [he]89-coggs gave [Paul]57-paul an interesting illustration of the latter branch of industry by twisting [his]57-paul right arm round and round till [he]57-paul nearly wrenched it out of the socket , while [Coker]88-coker seized [his]88-coker left hand and pounded it vigorously with the first joint of [his]88-coker forefinger , causing [the unfortunate Paul]57-paul to yell for mercy . At last [he]88-coker could bear no more , and breaking away from [[his]88-coker tormentors]641-his tormentors with a violent effort , [he]88-coker ran frantically down [the silent road]642-the silent road towards [a house which [he]88-coker knew from former visits to be [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone 's]643-a house which he knew from former visits to be dr. grimstone 's . [He]88-coker was but languidly pursued , and , as the distance was short , [he]88-coker soon gained a gate on the stuccoed posts of which [he]88-coker could read " [Crichton House]4-crichton house "[88-coker] by the light of a neighbouring gas - lamp . " This is a nice way , "[88-coker] [he]88-coker thought , as [he]88-coker reached [it]643-a house which he knew from former visits to be dr. grimstone 's breathless and trembling , " for [a father]227-a father to visit [[[his]227-a father son]225-his son 's school]2638-his son 's school ! "[88-coker] [He]88-coker had hoped to reach sanctuary before [the other two]542-the other two could overtake [him]88-coker ; but [he]88-coker soon discovered that the gate was shut fast , and all [his]88-coker efforts would not bring [him]88-coker within reach of the bell - handle — [he]88-coker was too short . So [he]88-coker sat down on the doorstep in resigned despair , and waited for [[his]88-coker enemies]645-his enemies . Behind the gate was [a large many - windowed house]646-a large many - windowed house , with steps leading up to [a portico]647-a portico . In [the playground]648-the playground to [his]88-coker right [the school gymnasium]649-the school gymnasium , [a great gallows - like erection]650-a great gallows - like erection , loomed black and grim through the mist , the night wind favouring the ghastliness of its appearance by swaying the ropes till they creaked and moaned weirdly on the hooks , and the metal stirrups clinked and clashed against one another in irregular cadence . [He]88-coker had no time to observe more , as [Coker]88-coker and [Coggs]89-coggs joined [him]88-coker , and , on finding [he]88-coker had not rung the bell , seized the occasion to pummel [him]88-coker at [their]651-their leisure before announcing [their]651-their arrival . Then the gate was opened , and [the three]652-the three — [the revengeful pair assuming an air of lamb - like inoffensiveness]653-the revengeful pair assuming an air of lamb - like inoffensiveness — entered [the hall]259-the hall and were met by [Mrs. Grimstone]100-mrs. grimstone . " Why , here [you]652-the three are ! "[100-mrs. grimstone] [she]100-mrs. grimstone said , with an air of surprise , and kissing [them]652-the three with real kindness . " How cold [you]652-the three look ! So [you]652-the three actually had to walk . No cabs as usual . [[You]652-the three poor boys]2639-you poor boys ! come in and warm [yourselves]652-the three . [You]652-the three 'll find all [[your]652-the three old friends]2640-your old friends in [the schoolroom]2641-the schoolroom . "[100-mrs. grimstone] [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul submitted to be kissed with some reluctance , inwardly hoping that [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone might never hear of it . [Mrs. Grimstone]100-mrs. grimstone , it may be said here , was [a stout , fair woman]655-a stout , fair woman , not in the least intellectual or imposing , but with a warm heart , and a way of talking to and about [boys]2308-boys that secured [her]100-mrs. grimstone the confidence of [mothers]657-mothers more effectually , perhaps , than the most polished conversation and irreproachable deportment could have done . [She]100-mrs. grimstone did not reserve [[her]100-mrs. grimstone motherliness]658-her motherliness for [the reception room]659-the reception room either , as [[some schoolmasters]660-some schoolmasters ' wives]661-some schoolmasters ' wives have a tendency to do , and [the smallest boy]662-the smallest boy felt less homesick when [he]662-the smallest boy saw [her]100-mrs. grimstone . [She]100-mrs. grimstone opened a green baize outer door , and the door beyond [it]663-it , and led [them]664-you into [a long high room]665-a long high room , with desks and forms placed against the walls , and a writing table , and line of brown - stained tables down the middle . Opposite the windows there was a curious structure of shelves partitioned into lockers , and filled with rows of shabby schoolbooks . [The room]213-the room had been originally intended for [a drawing - room]667-a drawing - room , as was evident from the inevitable white and gold wall - paper and the tarnished gilt beading round the doors and window shutters ; the mantelpiece , too , was of white marble , and the gaselier fitted with dingy crystal lustres . But sad - coloured maps hung on the ink - splashed walls , and a clock with a blank idiotic face ( it is not every clock that possesses a decently intelligent expression ) ticked over the gilt pier - glass . The boards were uncarpeted , and stained with patches of ink of all sizes and ages ; while the atmosphere , in spite of the blazing fire , had a scholastic blending of soap and water , ink and slate - pencil in its composition , which produced a chill and depressing effect . On the forms opposite the fire [some ten or twelve boys]668-some ten or twelve boys were sitting , a few comparing notes as to [their]668-some ten or twelve boys holiday experiences with some approach to vivacity . The rest , with hands in pockets and feet stretched towards the blaze , seemed lost in melancholy abstraction . " There ! "[100-mrs. grimstone] said [Mrs. Grimstone]100-mrs. grimstone cheerfully , " [you]664-you 'll have plenty to talk to [one another]2508-one another about . [I]100-mrs. grimstone 'll send [Tom]95-tommy in to see [you]664-you presently ! "[100-mrs. grimstone] And [she]100-mrs. grimstone left [them]664-you with a reassuring nod , though the prospect of [Tom]95-tommy 's company did not perhaps elate [them]664-you as much as it was intended to do . [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul felt much as if [he]57-paul had suddenly been dropped down [a bear - pit]669-a bear - pit , and , avoiding welcome and observation as well as [he]57-paul could , got away into a corner , from which [he]57-paul observed [[his]57-paul new companions]670-his new companions with uneasy apprehension . " [I]671-one boy say , "[671-one boy] said [one boy]671-one boy , resuming the interrupted conversation , " did [you]664-you go to [Drury Lane]26-drury lane ? Was n't it stunning ! [They]2649-they 've [a poky little house in [Brompton]28-brompton somewhere]2650-a poky little house in brompton somewhere , and there was no dancing , only boshy games and [a conjurer]2651-a conjurer , without any presents . ' "[674-one or two near him] The unfortunate [Skidmore]102-skidmore , when [he]675-he returned , soon found reason to regret [his]675-he rash hospitality , for [he]675-he never heard the last of the cake ( which had , as it happened , been paid for in the usual manner ) during the rest of the term . There was a slight laugh at the enormity of [Mrs. Skidmore]102-skidmore 's presumption , and then a long pause , after which [some one]260-some one asked suddenly , " Does [any one]2658-any one know whether [Chawner]101-chawner really has left this time ? "[260-some one] " [I]677-a big , heavy boy hope so , "[677-a big , heavy boy] said [a big , heavy boy]677-a big , heavy boy , and [his]677-a big , heavy boy hope seemed echoed with a general fervour . " [He]101-chawner 's been going to leave every term for the last year , but [I]677-a big , heavy boy believe [he]101-chawner really has done it this time . [He]101-chawner wrote and told [me]677-a big , heavy boy [he]101-chawner was n't coming back . "[677-a big , heavy boy] " Thank goodness ! "[678-several] said [several]678-several , with an evident relief , and [some one]260-some one was just observing that [they]678-several had had enough of the sneaking business , when a fly was heard to drive up , and the bell rang , whereupon [everyone]680-everyone abandoned [his]680-everyone easy attitude , and seemed to brace [himself]680-everyone up for a trying encounter . " Look out — here 's [Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone ! "[678-several] [they]678-several whispered under [their]678-several breaths , as voices and footsteps were heard in [the hall]259-the hall outside . Presently the door of [the schoolroom]2641-the schoolroom opened , and [another boy]683-another boy entered [the room]213-the room . [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone , it appeared , had not been [the occupant of the fly]685-the occupant of the fly , after all . [The new - comer]544-the new - comer was [a tall , narrow - shouldered , stooping fellow , with a sallow , unwholesome complexion , thin lips , and small sunken brown eyes]687-a tall , narrow - shouldered , stooping fellow , with a sallow , unwholesome complexion , thin lips , and small sunken brown eyes . [His]544-the new - comer cheeks were creased with a dimpling subsmile , half uneasy , half malicious , and [his]544-the new - comer tread was mincing and catlike . " Well , [[you]688-all fellows]2659-you fellows ? "[544-the new - comer] [he]544-the new - comer said . [All]688-all rose at once , and shook hands effusively . " Why , [Chawner]101-chawner ! "[678-several] [they]678-several cried , " how are [you]101-chawner , [old fellow]2660-old fellow ? [We]678-several thought [you]101-chawner were n't coming back ! "[678-several] There was a heartiness in [their]678-several manner somewhat at variance with [their]678-several recent expressions of opinion ; but [they]678-several had doubtless excellent reasons for any inconsistency . " Well , "[101-chawner] said [Chawner]101-chawner , in a low , soft voice , which had a suggestion of feminine spitefulness , " [I]101-chawner was going to leave , but [I]101-chawner thought [you]688-all 'd be getting into mischief here without [me]101-chawner to watch over [you]688-all . [Appleton]103-appleton , and [Lench]104-lench , and [Coker]88-coker want looking after badly , [I]101-chawner know . So , [you]688-all see , [I]101-chawner 've come back after all . "[101-chawner] [He]101-chawner laughed with a little malevolent cackle as [he]101-chawner spoke , and [the three boys named]689-the three boys named laughed too , though with no great heartiness , and shifting the while uneasily on [their]689-the three boys named seats . After this sally the conversation languished until [Tom Grimstone]95-tommy 's appearance . [He]95-tommy strolled in with a semi - professional air , and shook hands with affability . [Tom]95-tommy was [a short , flabby , sandy - haired youth , not particularly beloved of [[his]95-tommy comrades]691-his comrades]690-a short , flabby , sandy - haired youth , not particularly beloved of his comrades , and [his]95-tommy first remark was , " [I]95-tommy say , [[you]688-all chaps]2661-you chaps , have [you]688-all done [your]688-all holiday task ? [Pa]105-pa says [he]105-pa shall keep [everyone]680-everyone in who has n't . [I]95-tommy 've done [mine]95-tommy ; "[95-tommy] which , as a contribution to the general liveliness , was a distinct failure . Needless to say , the work imposed as a holiday occupation had been first deferred , then forgotten , then remembered too late , and recklessly defied with the confidence begotten in a home atmosphere . Amidst a general silence [Chawner]101-chawner happened to see [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul in [his]101-chawner corner , and crossed over to [him]101-chawner . " Why , there 's [Dicky Bultitude]106-dicky bultitude [there]2356-there all the time , and [he]106-dicky bultitude never came to shake hands ! Are n't [you]101-chawner going to speak to [me]57-paul ? "[57-paul]

[Paul]57-paul growled something indistinctly , feeling strangely uncomfortable and confused . " What 's the matter with [him]106-dicky bultitude ? "[101-chawner] asked [Chawner]101-chawner . " Does [anyone]2432-anyone know ? Has [he]106-dicky bultitude lost [his]106-dicky bultitude tongue ? "[101-chawner] " [He]106-dicky bultitude had n't lost it coming down in [the train]2319-the train , "[88-coker] said [Coker]88-coker : " [I]88-coker wish [he]106-dicky bultitude had . "[88-coker] And [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone really did arrive at this point , much to [Paul]57-paul 's relief , and looked in to give a grip of the hand and a few words to [those of [the boys [he]62-dr. grimstone had not seen]693-the boys he had not seen]692-those of the boys he had not seen . [Biddlecomb]92-biddlecomb , [Tipping]90-tipping , and [the rest]694-the rest , came in with [him]62-dr. grimstone , and [the schoolroom]2641-the schoolroom soon filled with others arriving by [later trains]696-later trains , amongst [the later comers]697-the later comers being [the two house - masters]698-the two house - masters , [Mr. Blinkhorn]108-mr. blinkhorn and [Mr. Tinkler]109-mr. tinkler ; and there followed a season of bustle and conversation , which lasted until [the Doctor]248-the doctor touched a small hand - bell , and ordered [them]700-them to sit down round the tables while supper was brought in . [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul was not sorry to hear the word " supper . "[57-paul] [He]57-paul was faint and dispirited , and although [he]57-paul had dined not very long since , thought that perhaps a little cold beef and beer , or some warmed - up trifle , might give [him]57-paul courage to tell [his]57-paul misfortunes before bedtime . Of one thing [he]57-paul felt certain . Nothing should induce [him]57-paul to trust [[his]57-paul person]701-his person in [a bedroom]702-a bedroom with [any of [those violent and vindictive boys]704-those violent and vindictive boys]703-any of those violent and vindictive boys ; whether [he]57-paul succeeded in declaring [himself]57-paul that night or not , [he]57-paul would at least insist on [a separate bedroom]705-a separate bedroom . Meantime [he]57-paul looked forward to supper as likely to restore geniality and confidence . But the supper announced so imposingly proved to consist of nothing more than two plates piled with small pieces of thinly - buttered bread , which [a page]706-a page handed round together with tumblers of water ; and [Paul]57-paul , in [his]57-paul disappointment , refused this refreshment with more firmness than politeness , as [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone observed . " [You]57-paul got into trouble last term , [Bultitude]57-paul , "[62-dr. grimstone] [he]62-dr. grimstone said sternly , " on account of this same fastidious daintiness . [[Your]57-paul excellent father]2521-your excellent father has informed [me]62-dr. grimstone of [your]57-paul waste and gluttony at [his]2521-your excellent father own bountifully spread table . Do n't let [me]62-dr. grimstone have occasion to reprove [you]57-paul for this again . "[62-dr. grimstone] [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul , feeling the necessity of propitiating [him]57-paul , hastened to take the two largest squares of bread and butter on the plate . They were moist and thick , and [he]57-paul had considerable difficulty in disposing of them , besides the gratification of hearing [himself]57-paul described as a " pig "[57-paul] by [[his]57-paul neighbours]707-his neighbours , who reproved [him]57-paul with a refreshing candour . " [I]57-paul must get away from here , "[57-paul] [he]57-paul thought , ruefully . " [Dick]60-dick seems very unpopular . [I]57-paul wish [I]57-paul did n't feel so low - spirited and unwell . Why ca n't [I]57-paul carry it off easily as — as a kind of joke ? How hard these forms are , and how [those infernal boys]2669-those infernal boys did jog [my]57-paul back ! "[57-paul] Bedtime came at length . [The boys]570-the boys filed , one by one , out of [the room]213-the room , and [the Doctor]248-the doctor stood by the door to shake hands with [them]570-the boys as [they]570-the boys passed . [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul lingered until [the others]627-the others had gone , for [he]57-paul had made up [his]57-paul mind to seize this opportunity to open [the Doctor]248-the doctor 's eyes to the mistake [he]57-paul was making . But [he]57-paul felt unaccountably nervous ; the diplomatic and well - chosen introduction [he]57-paul had carefully prepared had left [him]57-paul at the critical moment ; all power of thought was gone with it , and [he]57-paul went tremblingly up to [the schoolmaster]522-the schoolmaster , feeling hopelessly at the mercy of anything that chose to come out of [his]57-paul mouth . " [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone , "[57-paul] [he]57-paul began ; " before retiring [I]57-paul — [I]57-paul must insist — [I]57-paul mean [I]57-paul must request — — What [I]57-paul wish to say is — — "[57-paul] " [I]248-the doctor see , "[248-the doctor] said [the Doctor]248-the doctor , catching [him]57-paul up sharply . " [You]57-paul wish to apologise for [your]57-paul extraordinary behaviour in [the railway carriage]2530-the railway carriage ? "[248-the doctor] " It 's not that , "[57-paul] said [Paul]57-paul hopelessly ; " [I]57-paul wanted to explain — — "[57-paul]

" [Your]57-paul conduct with regard to the bread and butter ? If it was simply want of appetite , of course there is no more to be said . But [I]248-the doctor have an abhorrence of — — "[248-the doctor] " Quite right , "[57-paul] said [Paul]57-paul , recovering [himself]57-paul ; " [I]57-paul hate waste [myself]57-paul , but there is something [I]57-paul must tell [you]248-the doctor before — — "[57-paul] " If it concerns that disgraceful conduct of [Coker]88-coker 's , "[248-the doctor] said [the Doctor]248-the doctor , " [you]57-paul may speak on . [You]57-paul have found [some other boy with sweetmeats in [his]88-coker possession]2671-some other boy with sweetmeats in his possession ? "[248-the doctor] " Good Heavens , [sir]2329-sir ! "[57-paul] said [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul , losing [his]57-paul temper ; " [I]57-paul have n't been searching [the whole school]2673-the whole school for sweetmeats ! [I]57-paul have other things to occupy [my]57-paul mind , [sir]2329-sir . And , once for all , [I]57-paul demand to be heard ! [I]57-paul see that [one of [[your]57-paul assistants]2676-your assistants]2675-one of your assistants is writing at [his]2675-one of your assistants table there . "[57-paul] " Yes , [sir]2329-sir , "[248-the doctor] said [the Doctor]248-the doctor with terrible grimness , " [I]248-the doctor have a study — and [I]248-the doctor have a cane . "[248-the doctor] And , incredible as it may appear to [all who have never been in [his]248-the doctor position]717-all who have never been in his position , [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul went . It was almost an abdication , it was treachery to [his]248-the doctor true self ; [he]248-the doctor knew the vital importance of firmness at this crisis . But nevertheless [his]248-the doctor courage gave way all at once , and [he]248-the doctor crawled up the bare , uncarpeted stairs without any further protest ! " Good night , [Master Bultitude]57-paul , "[718-a housemaid] said [a housemaid]718-a housemaid , meeting [him]57-paul on the staircase : " [you]57-paul know [[your]57-paul bedroom]2682-your bedroom . [No . 6]2683-no . 6 , with [Master Coker]88-coker , and [Master Biddlecomb]92-biddlecomb , and the others . "[718-a housemaid]

[Paul]57-paul dragged [himself]57-paul up to [the highest landing - stage]719-the highest landing - stage , and , with a sick foreboding , opened the door on which the figure 6 was painted . [It]720-it was [a large bare plainly papered room]721-a large bare plainly papered room , with several curtainless windows , the blinds of which were drawn , a long deal stand of wash - hand basins , and eight little white beds against the walls . A fire was lighted in consideration of its being the first night , and [several boys]722-several boys were talking excitedly round [it]720-it . " Here [he]57-paul is ! [He]57-paul 's stayed behind to tell more tales ! "[722-several boys] [they]722-several boys cried , as [Paul]57-paul entered nervously . " Now then , [Bultitude]57-paul , what have [you]57-paul got to say for [yourself]57-paul ? "[57-paul] [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul felt powerless among [all these young wolves]723-all these young wolves . [He]57-paul had no knowledge of [boys]2308-boys , nor any notion of acquiring an influence over [them]2308-boys , having hitherto regarded [them]2308-boys as necessary nuisances , to be rather repressed than studied . [He]57-paul could only stare hopelessly at [them]2308-boys in fascinated silence . " [You]57-paul see [he]57-paul has n't a word to say for [himself]57-paul ! "[90-tipping] said [Tipping]90-tipping . " Look here , what shall [we]2684-we do to [him]57-paul ? Shall [we]2684-we try tossing in a blanket ? "[90-tipping] " No , [I]92-biddlecomb say , do n't toss [him]57-paul in a blanket , "[92-biddlecomb] pleaded [Biddlecomb]92-biddlecomb , and [Paul]57-paul felt gratefully towards [him]92-biddlecomb at the words ; " [anyone coming up]2686-anyone coming up would see what was going on . "[57-paul] " Now just [you]57-paul understand this clearly , "[57-paul] said [Paul]57-paul , thinking , not without reason , that this course of treatment was likely to prove painful ; " [I]57-paul refuse to allow [myself]57-paul to be flicked at with towels . [No one]2331-no one has ever offered [me]57-paul such an indignity in [my]57-paul life ! Oh , do [you]57-paul think [I]57-paul 've not enough on [my]57-paul mind as it is without the barbarities of a set of [young brutes like [you]57-paul]2688-young brutes like you ! "[57-paul] As this appeal was not of a very conciliatory nature [they]725-they at once proceeded to form a circle round [him]92-biddlecomb and , judging [their]725-they distance with great accuracy , jerked towels at [[his]92-biddlecomb person]701-his person with such diabolical dexterity that the wet corners cut [him]92-biddlecomb at all points like so many fine thongs , and [he]92-biddlecomb span round like a top , dancing , and , [I]0-i regret to add , swearing violently , at the pain . When [he]92-biddlecomb was worked up almost to frenzy pitch [Biddlecomb]92-biddlecomb 's sweet low voice cried , " Cave , [[you]57-paul fellows]2659-you fellows ! [I]92-biddlecomb hear [Grim]107-grim . Let [him]92-biddlecomb undress now , and [we]2659-you fellows can lam it into [him]92-biddlecomb afterwards with slippers ! "[92-biddlecomb] At this [they]725-they all cast off such of [their]725-they clothes as [they]725-they still wore , and slipped modestly and peacefully into bed , just as [Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone 's large form appeared at the doorway . [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul made as much haste as [he]57-paul could , but did not escape a reprimand from [the Doctor]248-the doctor as [he]57-paul turned the gas out ; and as soon as [he]57-paul had made the round of [the bedrooms]728-the bedrooms and [his]57-paul heavy tread had died away down the staircase , [the light - hearted occupants of No]729-the light - hearted occupants of no . 6 " lammed "[729-the light - hearted occupants of no] it into the unhappy [Paul]57-paul until [they]729-the light - hearted occupants of no were tired of the exercise and left [him]57-paul to creep sore and trembling with rage and fright into [his]57-paul cold hard bed . Then , after a little desultory conversation , one by one sank from incoherence into silence , and rose from silence to snores , while [Paul]57-paul alone lay sleepless , listening to the creeping tinkle of the dying fire , drearily wondering at the marvellous change that had come over [his]57-paul life and fortunes in the last few hours , and feverishly composing impassioned appeals which were to touch [the Doctor]248-the doctor 's heart and convince [his]248-the doctor reason . Sleep came at last , and brought too brief forgetfulness . It was not till the dull grey light of morning was glimmering through the blinds that [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul awoke to [his]57-paul troubles . [The room]213-the room was bitterly cold , and [he]57-paul remained shivering in bed for some time , trying to realise and prepare for [his]57-paul altered condition . [He]57-paul was [the only one awake]732-the only one awake . Now and then from one of the beds around [a boy]233-a boy would be heard talking in [his]233-a boy sleep , or laughing with holiday glee — at the drolleries possibly of some pantomime performed for [his]233-a boy amusement in [the Theatre Royal , Dreamland]734-the theatre royal , dreamland — [a theatre mercifully open to [all boys free of charge , long after the holidays have come to an end]736-all boys free of charge , long after the holidays have come to an end , the only drawbacks being a certain want of definiteness in the plot and scenery]735-a theatre mercifully open to all boys free of charge , long after the holidays have come to an end , the only drawbacks being a certain want of definiteness in the plot and scenery , and a liability to premature termination of the vaguely splendid performance . Once [Kiffin]91-kiffin , [the new boy]593-the new boy , awoke with a start and a heavy sigh , but [he]91-kiffin cried [himself]91-kiffin to sleep again almost immediately . [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul could bear being inactive no longer . [He]57-paul thought , if [he]57-paul got up , [he]57-paul might perhaps see [his]57-paul misfortunes shrink to a more bearable , less hopeless scale , and besides , [he]57-paul judged it prudent , for many reasons , to finish [his]57-paul toilet before [the sleepers]738-the sleepers began [theirs]738-the sleepers . Very stealthily , dreading to rouse [anyone]2432-anyone and attract attention in the form of slippers , [he]57-paul broke the clinking crust of ice in one of the basins and , shuddering from the shock , bathed face and hands in the biting water . [He]57-paul parted [his]57-paul hair , which from natural causes [he]57-paul had been unable to accomplish for some years , and now found an awkwardness in accomplishing neatly , and then stole down [the dark creaking staircase]740-the dark creaking staircase just as [the butler in [the hall]259-the hall]741-the butler in the hall began to swing the big railway bell which was to din stern reality into the sleepy ears above . In [the schoolroom]2641-the schoolroom [a yawning maid]744-a yawning maid had just lighted the fire , from which turbid yellow clouds of sulphurous smoke were pouring into [the room]213-the room , making it necessary to open the windows and lower a temperature that was far from high originally . [Paul]57-paul stood shaking by the mantelpiece in a very bad temper for some minutes . If [the Doctor]248-the doctor had come in then , [he]57-paul might have been spurred by indignation to utter [his]57-paul woes , and even claim and obtain [his]57-paul freedom . But that was not to be . The door did open presently , however , and [a little girl]747-a little girl appeared ; [a very charming little maiden indeed , in a neat dark costume relieved by a fresh white pinafore]748-a very charming little maiden indeed , in a neat dark costume relieved by a fresh white pinafore . [She]747-a little girl had deep grey eyes and glossy brown hair falling over [her]747-a little girl forehead and down [her]747-a little girl back in soft straight masses , [her]747-a little girl face was oval rather than round , and slightly serious , though [her]747-a little girl smile was pretty and gay . [She]747-a little girl ran towards [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul with a glad little cry , stretching out [her]747-a little girl hands . " [Dick]60-dick ! dear [Dick]60-dick ! "[747-a little girl] [she]747-a little girl said , " [I]747-a little girl am so glad ! [I]747-a little girl thought [you]60-dick 'd be down early ; as [you]60-dick used to be . [I]747-a little girl wanted to sit up last night so very much , but [mamma]2339-mamma would n't let [me]747-a little girl . "[747-a little girl] [Some]749-some might have been very glad to be welcomed in this way , even vicariously . As for [boys]2308-boys , it must have been [a very bad school indeed which [Dulcie Grimstone]110-dulcie could not have robbed of much of [its]110-dulcie terrors]751-a very bad school indeed which dulcie grimstone could not have robbed of much of its terrors . [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul , however , as has been explained , did not appreciate [children]240-children — being [a family man]753-a family man [himself]57-paul . When one sees [their]240-children petty squabbles and jealousies , hears [their]240-children cruel din , and pays for [their]240-children monkeyish mischief , perhaps [the daintiest children]754-the daintiest children seem but an earthly order of cherubim . [He]57-paul was only annoyed and embarrassed by the interruption , though [he]57-paul endured it . " Ah , "[57-paul] [he]57-paul said with condescension , " and so [you]110-dulcie 're [[Dr. Grimstone]62-dr. grimstone 's little girl]2691-dr. grimstone 's little girl , are [you]110-dulcie ? [You]57-paul were once . "[110-dulcie] " This is absurd , [you]57-paul know , "[57-paul] said [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul . " [You]57-paul ca n't think how absurd it is ! [I]57-paul 'm not [the Dick [you]57-paul used to know]2702-the dick you used to know ! "[57-paul] " [I]110-dulcie know [you]57-paul 're not ! "[110-dulcie] sobbed [Dulcie]110-dulcie . " But oh , [Dick]60-dick , [you]57-paul will be . Promise [me]110-dulcie [you]57-paul will be ! "[110-dulcie] And , to [Paul]57-paul 's horror and alarm , [she]110-dulcie put [her]110-dulcie arms round [his]57-paul neck , and cried piteously on [his]57-paul shoulder . " Good gracious ! "[57-paul] [he]57-paul cried , " let [me]57-paul go . Do n't do that , for Heaven 's sake ! [I]57-paul can hear [some one]260-some one coming . If it 's [[your]110-dulcie father]2566-your father , it will ruin [me]57-paul ! "[57-paul] But it was too late . Over [her]110-dulcie head [he]57-paul saw [Tipping]90-tipping enter [the room]213-the room , and stand glaring at [them]756-them menacingly . [Dulcie]110-dulcie saw [him]57-paul too , and sprang away to the window , where [she]110-dulcie tried to dry [her]110-dulcie eyes unperceived , and then ran past [him]57-paul with a hurried good morning , and escaped , leaving [Paul]57-paul alone with the formidable [Tipping]90-tipping .

There was an awkward silence at first , which [Tipping]90-tipping broke by saying , " What have [you]57-paul been saying to make [her]110-dulcie cry , eh ? "[90-tipping] " What 's that to [you]57-paul , [sir]2329-sir ? "[57-paul] said [Paul]57-paul , trying to keep [his]57-paul voice firm . " Why , it 's just this to [me]90-tipping , "[90-tipping] said [Tipping]90-tipping , " that [I]90-tipping 've been spoons on [Dulcie]110-dulcie [myself]90-tipping ever since [I]90-tipping came , and [she]110-dulcie never would have a word to say to [me]90-tipping . [I]90-tipping never could think why , and now it turns out to be [you]57-paul ! What do [you]90-tipping mean by cutting [me]90-tipping out like this ? [I]90-tipping heard [her]110-dulcie call [you]57-paul ' dear [Dick]60-dick . ' "[90-tipping] " Do n't be an ass , [sir]2329-sir ! "[57-paul] said [Paul]57-paul angrily . " Now , none of [your]57-paul cheek , [you]57-paul know ! "[90-tipping] said [Tipping]90-tipping , edging up against [him]57-paul with a dangerous inclination first to jostle aggressively , and then maul [[his]57-paul unconscious rival]757-his unconscious rival . " [You]57-paul just mind what [I]90-tipping say . [I]90-tipping 'm not going to have [Dulcie]110-dulcie bothered by [a young beggar]2707-a young beggar in the second form ; [she]110-dulcie deserves something better than that , anyway , and [I]90-tipping tell [you]57-paul that if [I]90-tipping once catch [you]57-paul talking to [her]110-dulcie in the way [you]57-paul did just now , or if [I]90-tipping hear of [her]110-dulcie favouring [you]57-paul more than [any other fellows]2708-any other fellows , [I]90-tipping 'll give [you]57-paul the very juiciest licking [you]57-paul ever had in [your]57-paul life . So look out ! "[90-tipping] At this point [the other boys]592-the other boys began to straggle down and cluster round the fire , and [Paul]57-paul withdrew from the aggrieved Tipping , and looked drearily out of the window on [the hard road]759-the hard road and bare black trees outside . " [I]57-paul must tell [the Doctor]248-the doctor how [I]57-paul 'm situated ! "[57-paul] [he]57-paul thought ; " and yet directly [I]57-paul open [my]57-paul mouth , [he]248-the doctor threatens to flog [me]57-paul . If [I]57-paul stay [here]2411-here , [that little girl]2711-that little girl will be always trying to speak to [me]57-paul , and [I]57-paul shall be thrashed by [the red - haired boy]2712-the red - haired boy . If [I]57-paul could only manage to speak out after breakfast ! "[57-paul] It was not without satisfaction that [he]57-paul remembered that [he]57-paul paid extra for " meat for breakfast "[57-paul] in [[his]57-paul son]225-his son 's school - bills , for [he]57-paul was beginning to look forward to meal - time with the natural desire of a young and healthy frame for nourishment . At eight o'clock [the Doctor]248-the doctor came in and announced breakfast , leading the way [himself]248-the doctor to what was known in [the school]506-the school as the " [Dining Hall]2713-dining hall . "[248-the doctor] [It]763-it scarcely deserved so high - sounding a name perhaps , being [a long low room on [the basement floor]765-the basement floor , with a big fireplace , fitted with taps , and baking ovens , which provoked the suspicion that [it]763-it had begun existence as [a back kitchen]766-a back kitchen]764-a long low room on the basement floor , with a big fireplace , fitted with taps , and baking ovens , which provoked the suspicion that it had begun existence as a back kitchen . [The Doctor]248-the doctor took [his]248-the doctor seat alone at a cross table forming the top of one of the two rows of tables , set with white cups and saucers , and plates well heaped with the square pieces of bread and butter , while [Mrs. Grimstone]100-mrs. grimstone with Dulcie and [Tom]95-tommy , sat at the foot of the same row , behind two ugly urns of dull block - tin . But when [Mr. Bultitude]57-paul , more hungry than [he]57-paul had felt for years , found [his]57-paul place at one of the tables , [he]57-paul was disgusted to find upon [his]57-paul plate — not , as [he]57-paul had confidently expected , a couple of plump poached eggs , with [their]768-their appetising contrast of ruddy gold and silvery white , not a crisp and crackling sausage or a mottled omelette , not even the homely but luscious rasher , but a brace of chill forbidding sardines , lying grim and headless in bilious green oil ! It was a fish [he]57-paul positively loathed , nor could it be reasonably expected that the confidence necessary for a declaration was to be forgotten by so sepulchral a form of nutriment . [He]57-paul roused [himself]57-paul , however , to swallow them , together with some of the thin and tin - flavoured coffee . But the meal as a whole was so different from the plentiful well - cooked breakfasts [he]57-paul had sat down before for years as a matter of course , that it made [him]57-paul feel extremely unwell . No talking was allowed during the meal . [The Doctor]248-the doctor now and then looked up from [his]248-the doctor dish of kidneys on toast ( at which envious glances were occasionally cast ) to address a casual remark to [[his]248-the doctor wife]770-his wife across the long row of plates and cups , but , as a rule , the dull champing sound of [boys]2308-boys solemnly and steadily munching was all that broke the silence .

Towards the end , when the plates had been generally cleared , and [the boys]570-the boys sat staring with the stolidity of repletion at one another across the tables , [the junior house - master]773-the junior house - master , [Mr. Tinkler]109-mr. tinkler , made [his]109-mr. tinkler appearance . [He]57-paul had lately left [a small and little - known college at [Cambridge]29-cambridge]774-a small and little - known college at cambridge , where [he]57-paul had contrived , contrary to expectation , to evade the uncoveted wooden spoon by just two places , which enabled [the Doctor]248-the doctor to announce [himself]57-paul as being " assisted by [a graduate of [the University of [Cambridge]29-cambridge]2715-the university of cambridge who has taken honours in the Mathematical Tripos . "[248-the doctor] For the rest , [he]57-paul was [a small insignificant - looking person , who evidently disliked the notice [his]57-paul late appearance drew upon [himself]57-paul]776-a small insignificant - looking person , who evidently disliked the notice his late appearance drew upon himself]2714-a graduate of the university of cambridge who has taken honours in the mathematical tripos . " for the rest , he was a small insignificant - looking person , who evidently disliked the notice his late appearance drew upon himself . " [Mr. Tinkler]109-mr. tinkler , "[248-the doctor] said [the Doctor]248-the doctor in [his]248-the doctor most awful voice , " if it were [my]248-the doctor custom to rebuke [[my]248-the doctor assistants]2716-my assistants before [the school]506-the school ( which it is not ) , [I]248-the doctor should feel forced to remind [you]109-mr. tinkler that this tardiness in rising is a bad beginning of the day 's work , and sets a bad example to [those under [your]109-mr. tinkler authority]2718-those under your authority . "[248-the doctor] [Mr. Tinkler]109-mr. tinkler made no articulate reply , but sat down with a crushed expression , and set [himself]109-mr. tinkler to devour bread and butter with an energy which [he]109-mr. tinkler hoped would divert attention from [his]109-mr. tinkler blushes ; and almost immediately [the Doctor]248-the doctor looked at [his]248-the doctor watch and said , " Now , [boys]2308-boys , [you]2308-boys have half - an - hour for ' chevy'—make the most of it . When [you]2308-boys come in [I]248-the doctor shall have something to say to [you]2308-boys all . Do n't rise , [Mr. Tinkler]109-mr. tinkler , unless [you]2308-boys have quite finished . "[248-the doctor] [Mr. Tinkler]109-mr. tinkler preferred leaving [his]109-mr. tinkler breakfast to continuing it under the trying ordeal of [[his]109-mr. tinkler principal]779-his principal 's inspection . So , hastily murmuring that [he]109-mr. tinkler had " made an excellent breakfast"—which[109-mr. tinkler] [he]109-mr. tinkler had not — [he]109-mr. tinkler followed [the others , who clattered [upstairs]264-upstairs to put on [their]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground boots and go out into [the playground]648-the playground]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground . It was noticeable that [they]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground did so without much of the enthusiasm which might be looked for from [[boys]2308-boys dismissed to [their]2308-boys sports]784-boys dismissed to their sports . But the fact was that this particular sport , " chevy , "[780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground] commonly known as " [[prisoners]2720-prisoners ' base]2721-prisoners ' base , "[780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground] was by no means a popular amusement , being of a somewhat monotonous nature , and calling for no special skill on the part of [the performers]785-the performers . Besides this , moreover , it had the additional disadvantage ( which would have been fatal to a far more fascinating diversion ) of being in a great measure compulsory . Football and cricket were of course reserved for half - holidays , and played in [a neighbouring field rented by [the Doctor]248-the doctor]786-a neighbouring field rented by the doctor , and in [the playground]648-the playground [he]109-mr. tinkler restricted [them]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground to " chevy , "[109-mr. tinkler] which [he]109-mr. tinkler considered , rightly enough , both gave [them]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground abundant exercise and kept [them]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground out of mischief . Accordingly , if [any adventurous spirit]789-any adventurous spirit started a rival game , it was usually abandoned sooner or later in deference to suggestions from [headquarters]790-headquarters which were not intended to be disregarded . This , though undoubtedly well meant , did not serve to stimulate [their]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground affection for the game , an excellent one in moderation , but one which , if played " by special desire "[780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground] two or three hours a day for weeks in succession is apt to lose its freshness and pall upon the youthful mind . It was a bright morning . There had been a hard frost during the night , and the ground was hard , sparkling with rime and ringing to the foot . The air was keen and invigorating , and the bare black branches of the trees were outlined clear and sharp against the pale pure blue of the morning sky . Just the weather for a long day 's skating over the dark green glassy ice , or a bracing tramp on [country roads]791-country roads into [cheery red - roofed market towns]792-cheery red - roofed market towns . But now it had lost all power to charm . It was almost depressing by the contrast between the boundless liberty suggested , and the dull reality of a round of uninteresting work which was all it heralded . So [they]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground lounged listlessly about , gravitating finally towards the end of [the playground]648-the playground , where a deep furrow marked the line of the base . There was no attempt to play . [They]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground stood gossiping in knots , grumbling and stamping [their]780-the others , who clattered upstairs to put on their boots and go out into the playground feet to keep warm . By - and - by the day - [boarders]794-boarders began to drop in one by one , [several of [them]794-boarders]795-several of them , from a want of tact in adapting [themselves]795-several of them to the general tone , earning decided unpopularity at once by a cheerful briskness and an undisguised satisfaction at having something definite to do once more . If [Mr. Tinkler]109-mr. tinkler , who had joined [one of [the groups]797-the groups]796-one of the groups , had not particularly distinguished [himself]109-mr. tinkler at breakfast , [he]109-mr. tinkler made ample amends now , and by the grandeur and manliness of [his]109-mr. tinkler conversation succeeded in producing a decided impression upon [some of [the smaller boys]799-the smaller boys]798-some of the smaller boys . " The bore of [a place like this]2722-a place like this , [you]2723-you know , "[109-mr. tinkler] [he]109-mr. tinkler was saying with magnificent disdain , " is that [a fellow ca n't have [his]2724-a fellow ca n't have his pipe of a morning pipe of a morning]2724-a fellow ca n't have his pipe of a morning . [I]109-mr. tinkler 've been used to it , and so , of course , [I]109-mr. tinkler miss it . If [I]109-mr. tinkler chose to insist on it [Grimstone]100-mrs. grimstone could n't say anything ; but with [a lot of [young fellows]2726-young fellows like [you]2723-you]2725-a lot of young fellows like you , [you]2723-you see , it would n't look well ! "[109-mr. tinkler] It could hardly have looked worse than [little Mr. Tinkler]109-mr. tinkler [himself]109-mr. tinkler would have done , if [he]109-mr. tinkler had ventured upon more than the mildest of cigarettes , for [he]109-mr. tinkler was [a poor but pertinacious smoker]800-a poor but pertinacious smoker , and [his]109-mr. tinkler love for the weed was chastened by wholesome fear . There , however , [he]109-mr. tinkler was in no danger of betraying this , and indeed it would have been injudicious to admit it . " Talking of smoking , "[109-mr. tinkler] [he]109-mr. tinkler went on , with a soft chuckle , as at recollections of unspeakable devilry , " did [I]109-mr. tinkler ever tell [you]2723-you chaps of a tremendous scrape [I]109-mr. tinkler very nearly got into up at [the ' Varsity]2727-the ' varsity ? Well , [you]2723-you must know there 's a foolish rule there against smoking in [the streets]2728-the streets . Not that that made any difference to [some of [us]2730-us]2729-some of us ! Well , one night about nine , [I]109-mr. tinkler was strolling down [Petty Cury]30-petty cury with [two other men]2731-two other men , smoking ( [Bosher of "[109-mr. tinkler] Pothouse]111-bosher of " pothouse , " and [Peebles of "[109-mr. tinkler] Cats]112-peebles of " cats , " both pretty well known up there for general rowdiness , [you]2723-you know — [great pals of [mine]109-mr. tinkler]2732-great pals of mine ! ) and , just as [we]2730-us turned the corner , who should [we]2730-us see coming straight down on [us]2730-us but [a Proctor]2733-a proctor with [his]2733-a proctor bull - dogs ( not dogs , [you]2723-you know , but the strongest ' gyps ' in college ) . [Bosher]111-bosher of " pothouse said , ' Let 's cut it ! ' and [he]2733-a proctor and [Peebles]112-peebles of " cats bolted . ( [They]2731-two other men were [neither of [them]2731-two other men funks]2734-neither of them funks , of course , but [they]2731-two other men lost [their]2731-two other men heads . ) [I]109-mr. tinkler went calmly on , smoking [my]109-mr. tinkler cigar as if nothing was the matter . That put [the Proctor]2735-the proctor in a bait , [I]109-mr. tinkler can tell [you]2723-you ! [He]2735-the proctor came fuming up to [me]109-mr. tinkler . ' What do [you]109-mr. tinkler mean , [sir]2329-sir , ' says [he]2735-the proctor , quite pale with anger ( [he]2735-the proctor was [a great bull - headed fellow]2737-a great bull - headed fellow , [one of [the strongest dons of [his]2735-the proctor year]2739-the strongest dons of his year]2738-one of the strongest dons of his year , that 's why [they]2731-two other men made [him]2735-the proctor a Proctor)—'what do [you]109-mr. tinkler mean by breaking the University Statutes in this way ? ' ' It is a fine evening , ' said [I]109-mr. tinkler ( [I]109-mr. tinkler was determined to keep cool ) . ' Do [you]109-mr. tinkler mean to insult [me]109-mr. tinkler ? ' said [he]2735-the proctor .
